mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO resume (resume_no, member_no, resume_title, resume_name, resume_gender,resume_email,resume_phone,resume_cellphone,resume_addr,forms_employment,desired_work_place,salary) VALUES (resume_seq.nextval, #{member_no}, #{resume_title}, #{resume_name}, #{resume_gender}, #{resume_email}, #{resume_phone}, #{resume_cellphone}, #{resume_addr}, #{forms_employment}, #{desired_work_place}, #{salary})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
